thread.title: The Best Way to Appeal College Financial-Aid Decisions

author: Chana R. Schoenberger
title: The Best Way to Appeal College Financial-Aid Decisions
text:
As colleges announce admissions decisions for the fall, we asked experts to help answer readers’ questions on paying for college and the best use of tax-advantaged “529” savings accounts.
How can I appeal financial-aid decisions made by the college? How should the appeal be phrased in writing?
Sometimes the financial-aid package a college... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
